Author: corentin
Content:
It doesn't have to.
But most software people tend to design solutions starting from "best practices" and address every imaginable problem ("what if X and Y happen while Z is going on?") so they often end up with complicated stuff. Whereas, if you start from scratch and focus on the most efficient way to address only the main problems, it can be brutally simple.

Author: eugenet
Title: How to phone a webpage with Ryan Gallagher of ConnectMeAnywhere

Author: nostrademons
Content: MySpace.  MySpace got popular largely through small independent bands that used it to stay in close touch with their fans.  It's still one of the best places to go if you're a struggling artist with a small but devoted fanbase.
